name: Apple Pancake
author: starmaster25
summary: This is as close as I have found to the apple pancake at the Original Pancake House. A fluffy, sweet pancake. Excellent with a scoop of vanilla ice cream
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Melt butter in an oven-safe skillet over medium heat; cook and stir apple slices, about 1/4 cup sugar, and cinnamon in butter until apples are tender, about 5 minutes
Beat eggs, milk, flour, remaining 1/4 cup sugar, baking powder, vanilla extract, and salt in a large bowl until batter is smooth; pour batter evenly over apples
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 10 minutes
Run a spatula around the edges of the pancake to loosen
Invert skillet over a large plate to serve
